Title: New post
Description:
There’s a button in WordPress that initiates a new post.
And another that publishes it.
That’s a clear and practical metaphor for what we do, all day, every day.
The ‘post’ of our action or inaction might seem trivial, but it’s a post nonetheless.
Layer by la…

Title: Baseus just rolled out the best 5,000mAh Qi 2 power bank
Description: With the PicoGo AM31, Baseus delivered what may just be the best Qi 2 power bank you can buy today.

Title: LaCie Rugged SSD4 is a durable 4TB external SSD that does it all
Description: LaCie's Rugged SSD4 is an external drive that has a distinctive design and USB4 connectivity, making it one of the fastest SSDs you can buy today.

Title: Here's When iOS 26 Rolls Out Today in Every Time Zone
Description:
Today's the day.
Apple is about to release iOS 26, which will deliver the biggest redesign since iOS 7 and bring a range of new features and improvements to iPhones worldwide.
It's Apple's biggest software update of the year, and Apple announced at last week'…

Title: My Apple AirPods Pro 3 Review: Big Improvements, Same Price, No Compromises
Description: They cost the same at a hefty $249, but Apple's third-generation noise-canceling earbuds have improved in all the key areas, including fit, noise cancellation, sound quality and battery life.

Title: What we know about the suspect arrested in Charlie Kirk's killing. And, Emmy takeaways
Description:
Authorities say the suspect in the Charlie Kirk murder investigation is not cooperating.
However, the people around him are.
Here's what we know.
And, takeaways from the 2025 Emmys.

Title: A Utah church embarks on a healing journey in the aftermath of the Kirk assassination
Description:
A church in Orem, Utah, the city where Charlie Kirk was killed, brings healing during its Sunday service.
"We're going to be navigating this as a community and as a church family for months to come."

Title: 'Darkest before the light': These investors think AI can lift VC out of its consumer tech slump
Description:
It's been a rough few years for consumer investing.
A small but vocal group of VCs is betting AI will change everything.

Title: Meet Silicon Valley's new AI startup whisperer
Description: Menlo Ventures' Deedy Das is stepping up to partner just as venture capital demands sharper technical chops.

Title: US says China spreads 'false' World War Two narratives to pressure Taiwan
Description: TAIPEI (Reuters) -China is intentionally mischaracterising World War Two-era documents to put pressure on and isolate Taiwan given those agreements made no...

Title: Broncos penalty gives Colts second chance, win
Description: The Colts snagged a 29-28 victory after kicker Spencer Shrader converted a 45-yard field goal with no time remaining, but only after badly missing a 60-yard attempt that was negated by a Denver personal foul moments earlier.

Title: From dormant to dominant: Why Dominique Malonga could save the Storm
Description: The Storm knew all along Dominique Malonga would emerge as a key part of their WNBA title hopes -- whether it's this year or in years to come.

Title: C.J. Stroud learning how to balance life and faith with being face of the Texans
Description: Houston's quarterback dialed back his offseason appearances to focus more on himself.

Title: 'What's your deal?': Timeline of Jim Harbaugh and Pete Carroll's nearly two-decade-long rivalry
Description: The Chargers-Raiders "Monday Night Football" matchup marks a renewal of Jim Harbaugh and Pete Carroll's nearly 20-year beef.

Title: They Had a Mysterious Illness. Someone Finally Told Them It Was Real—and There Was a Cure. They Got Something Very Different.
Description:
The “boot camp” promised a miracle.
That’s not what they experienced.

Title: Fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk puts Utah Valley University's security under scrutiny
Description: The fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk has put Utah Valley University under scrutiny as law enforcement experts say security was lacking.

Title: Apple Watch Series 11 gets FDA-cleared alert for 'silent killer' condition
Description: The new Apple Watch hypertension feature passively monitors blood pressure patterns over 30 days using sensors to detect chronic high blood pressure signs.

Title: The U.S. Government’s Extraordinary Pursuit of Kilmar Ábrego García
Description: Cristian Farias writes that the Trump Administration’s maneuvers are rising to a political prosecution.

Title: “Our Elsewhere,” by Maxine Scates
Description: Poetry by Maxine Scates: “I wanted to tell you about what it’s like here now, / I wrote to my friend David.”

Title: Where the Waters Once Flowed
Description: A local photographer tracks down the ghosts of former springs and wells in New York City, Robert Sullivan writes.
